SCOPE: MVP
task_queue: Create index.html containing the game board, player turn indicator, and reset button.
Style the game board with grid lines and center the elements on the page.
Implement the game logic in script.js to handle player turns, check for win/loss/tie conditions, and update the UI accordingly.
Add event listeners to each cell of the game board to capture player moves.
Update the player turn indicator based on whose turn it is.
Handle the reset button to clear the game board and reset the game state.
Implement LocalStorage in localStorage.js to save the current game state so that the game can be resumed later.
Create styles.css which handles: Styling for the game board and elements
